H0.text: Which superhero lives beneath the sea and can command all of the marine life via telepathic abilities. Namor

H1.text: Which superhero lives beneath the sea and can command all of the marine life via telepathic abilities. King Shark

H2.text: Which superhero lives beneath the sea and can command all of the marine life via telepathic abilities. Triton

H3.text: Which superhero lives beneath the sea and can command all of the marine life via telepathic abilities. Aquaman

A4.text: He displays his immense psychic control over sea life when he single-handedly shuts down the minds of Atlantean soldiers under the control of Attuma.

A5.text: Aquaman's base was 'a wrecked fishing boat kept underwater,' in which he also lived.
